name: Live Video Shopping App UI Design
description:
It is quite an old concept to look at photos worn by models and shop online. An overall 3D video gives much better information about how the outfits look or that piece of jewelry shines!


Recently, we designed a LIVE E-Commerce platform for our client. 


Attached here is a sneak peek into the design of the same. Take a look!


https://www.excellentwebworld.com/live-video-shopping-app-development/
